steps.step: step back into a neutral bow as you pin your opponent's left hand to your chest with your left hand. Simultaneously execute a upward to your opponent's left elbow.
Execute a hammering inward to your opponent's left arm as you release your pin.
Execute a outward hand sword to your opponent's neck

notes.note: When the opponent is really grabbing as if to punch, stepping back often isn't an option. To get the arm bar, the uppercut/upward block needs to act similarly to the uppercut in obscure claws.
